jobDescription: Join our team and experience Workday! It's fun to work in a company where people truly believe in what they're doing. At Workday, we're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business of enterprise applications. We work hard, and we're serious about what we do. But we like to have a good time, too. In fact, we run our company with that principle in mind every day: One of our core values is fun. Job DescriptionResponsibilities: Technical Data Analyst will design, develop and administer various reports to help Products Organization. Included within those responsibilities are the areas of data access and delivery technologies. An ideal candidate will work with various teams to understand their reporting needs, create reports and share with key stakeholders.  Coordinating others' work while involved with multiple work streams Required Skills:Experience with SQLExperience with BI tool like TableauExperience with Hadoop, Hive, HQL will be a plusSkilled in coding languages (Java preferred)Ability to thrive in a fast paced, evolving work environmentPrevious experience building and executing tools to monitor and report on data quality
